hatan, nuwaraeliya pradhana margaye dimbaulapathana pradeshayedi yathurupadiyak saha motar rathayak muhunata muhuna gatimen sidu wu anathurakin yathurupadikaru  ha pasupadikaru thuwala laba kotagala rohalata athulath kara thibenawa.mese anathurata pathwuye awissawella, kosgama pradeshaye sita nuwaraeliya dakwa yathurupadi 10 kin samanwitha wisi denekuge kandayamak winoda charikawak sandaha nuwaraeliya wetha pamina nawatha yamin sitiyadi in ek yathurupadiyak ha ginigathhena kalawaldeniya pradeshaye nada niwasakata pamina sita, siya gama pradeshaya wana badulla dakwa gaman karamin siti motar rathayak.anathura eeye 16 paswaru 6.15 ta pamana siduwi athi bawayi dimbaulapanatha polisiya pawasuwa.ema anathurata bhajanaya wu yathurupadiye gamankaramin siti tharunayin dedena kotagala rohale newasikawa prathikara labana athara owunge thathwaya barapathala nowana bawa ema rohale prakashakayeku sandahan kala.wangu sahitha margaye adhika wegayen gaman karamin siti yathurupadikaruwan wangu sahitha sthanaye thawath yathurupadiyak pasukarayamata uthsaha kirimath samaga palanayen midi thama manthiruwen pita pana wiruddha desin pamini motar rathaye gatimen anathura sidu wi thibenawa.siddiya sambandhayen dimbaulapathana polisiya wadidura parishana pawathwanawa.
